summary: Completed comprehensive testing of A&O Ecosystem login and dashboard features. All backend APIs (17/17) passed. Frontend login and all dashboards working correctly.
passed_tests: Login with valid credentials - returns user data and session token
Login with invalid credentials - correctly returns 401
Login with missing fields - correctly returns 422 validation error
Auth/me endpoint - returns current user data
Inverfact strategies list - returns 4 available strategies
Inverfact user strategies - returns user's active strategies
Inverfact admin users-strategies - returns all users with strategy activations
Inverfact contact form - successfully submits contact request
NomadHive profile - returns impulsador profile with referral code
NomadHive tasks - returns available tasks with completion status
NomadHive rewards - returns available rewards with point costs
NomadHive orders - returns impulsador orders
NomadHive leaderboard - returns top impulsadores
Admin dashboard stats - returns products, orders, users, revenue
Admin products list - returns 6 products
Admin users list - returns 4 users with roles
Admin InverPulse investors - returns 1 investor
Frontend Login page - loads correctly with email/password inputs
Frontend Login flow - successfully authenticates and redirects to dashboard
Frontend Admin Dashboard - all sections working (Overview, Products, Users, Inverfact, InverPulse)
Frontend Inverfact Dashboard - shows active strategies (GT-KWNEX, InverPulse)
Frontend NomadHive Dashboard - all tabs working (Overview, Tasks, Rewards, Orders, Leaderboard)
seed_data_creation: Admin user has GT-KWNEX and InverPulse strategies activated. Admin is registered in InverPulse with RUBI level.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All login and dashboard features are working correctly. The super admin user has access to all dashboards including Admin, Inverfact (with 2 active strategies), and NomadHive (with 5 points). Backend APIs are fully functional with proper authentication via session cookies.

login.details: Email/password login working, session cookie set correctly, redirects to /dashboard

admin_dashboard.details: Shows stats (6 products, 0 orders, 4 users, $0 revenue), Products ANMA management, Users & Roles management, Inverfact Strategies management, InverPulse investors list

inverfact_dashboard.details: Shows 2 active strategies (InverPulse, GT-KWNEX), Educational Resources section, user info displayed correctly

nomadhive_dashboard.details: All 5 tabs working - Overview (5 points, $0 commissions, referral code NH33E053), Tasks (daily/weekly/onboarding), Rewards (4 available), Orders (empty), Leaderboard (1 entry)
